page.title: 13Housing in Dalton and Barrow
page.content: The houses in the housing estates in our block are mostly bungalows,semi detached and detached houses.There are not many flats;most of them are over the shops though there are one or two others.There are no blocks of flats at all.The majority of houses have a living room,a dining room or area,2,3 or 4 bedrooms,a bathroom,a kitchen and a small entrance hall.There are a few bigger houses especially in the Crossland Park area of Barrow.The very big houses have 5 bedrooms and more living room space downstairs.Many of the bungalows are dormer bungalows.The housing area in Dalton has some council houses but most of the housing in our block is privately owned.The majoraty of the houses have gardens at the front and back.Many of the houses have garages,some have sheds or green- houses in the garden.
